page.title: 07CASTLETOWN POLICE STATION
page.content: Castletown has a one man police station which is also the home of the village policeman whose job is in many ways different to that of the city policeman.Only a small part of his job is taken up with crime,his job being to serve the community in many ways.Apart from knowing the villagers well,he must patrol the countryside.In a country area many farmers have shotguns and the policeman has to check suitability before renewing licences.In a city many departments deal with enquiries ,but a village policeman has to deal with everything.In summer his 8 hour day is often longer due to increased traffic. Motoring offences are the most common offences.It is often thought that the country is safe,but there are dangers -the harbour,the cliffs,the beach,the disused quarries and of course,farms.
